Create an iwillsurvive object

Source: R/iwillsurvive.R
iwillsurvive.Rd

Create an iwillsurvive object

iwillsurvive(
  cohort,
  followup_time = "followup_months",
  event_status = "event_status",
  patient_id = "patientid",
  terms = NULL,
  type = "right",
  fit = NULL,
  event_title = "<event>",
  index_title = "<index>",
  title = NULL,
  followup_time_units = NULL,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

cohort

dataframe. A one-row-per-patient dataframe
followup_time

character. The column representing followup time.
event_status

character. The column representing event status -- must be logical.
patient_id

character. ... uniquep patientid.
terms

character. A vector of model terms.
type

character. See ?survival::survfit.formula
fit

survfit. An optional survfit object created from survival:survfit(). If specified, no additional model(s) will be fit.
event_title

character. An optional name of
index_title

character.
title

character. An optional title of the analysis that is passed to print() and plot() methods.
followup_time_units

character. Units used in followup time
verbose

logical. If TRUE, return messages

Value

survfit. See ?survival::survfit.object to learn more

Examples


cohort_survival

#> # A tibble: 250 x 6
#>    patientid sex     age condition followup_days event_status
#>    <chr>     <chr> <dbl> <chr>             <dbl> <lgl>       
#>  1 F00001    m      41.8 placebo          1660.  FALSE       
#>  2 F00002    m      45.3 placebo            70.1 TRUE        
#>  3 F00003    m      52.9 drug              333.  TRUE        
#>  4 F00004    m      48.4 drug              167.  FALSE       
#>  5 F00005    f      54.4 placebo           338.  TRUE        
#>  6 F00006    f      50.7 placebo           232.  TRUE        
#>  7 F00007    f      47.6 placebo           388.  TRUE        
#>  8 F00008    f      42.7 placebo           175.  TRUE        
#>  9 F00009    m      48.1 drug              528.  TRUE        
#> 10 F00010    m      28.9 placebo           197.  TRUE        
#> # … with 240 more rows

# No Terms

cohort_fit <- iwillsurvive(cohort_survival,
                          followup_time = "followup_days")

#> ── iwillsurvive ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> - 202 of 250 (81%) patient(s) experienced the event.
#> - survival::survfit(survival::Surv(followup_days, event_status, type = 'right') ~ 1, data = cohort)
#> - Median Survival = 312.95
cohort_fit

#> An iwillsurvive object estimating survival from <index> to <event> 
#> 
#> 250 Patients:
#> <event> = 202 (81%), Censored = 48 (19%)
#> 
#> Median Survival (days):
#> all = 313
#>

# Now including a term

cohort_fit <- iwillsurvive(cohort_survival,
                           followup_time = "followup_days",
                           terms = "condition")

#> ── iwillsurvive ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> - 202 of 250 (81%) patient(s) experienced the event.
#> - survival::survfit(survival::Surv(followup_days, event_status, type = 'right') ~ condition, data = cohort)
cohort_fit

#> An iwillsurvive object estimating survival from <index> to <event> 
#> 
#> 250 Patients:
#> <event> = 202 (81%), Censored = 48 (19%)
#> 
#> Median Survival (days):
#> drug = 410.5, placebo = 231.8
#> diff = 179
#>
